title: FPS problems after forced to upgrade for the new client

Your girlfriends pc may need to update a driver here or there after the update. Let's make sure to go through all the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) so that you cover all of your bases. Feel free to let me know if you still need a little more help though ^_^!
